ocean.question: I am a big blue place where fish like to swim. What am I?

additionalData.altText: A big blue area where fish live.

ocean.question: I’m a colorful fish that Nemo loved to be. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in a sea anemone.
🎬 You can see me in a popular cartoon.

additionalData.altText: A colorful fish that lives in the ocean.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.

additionalData.altText: A slow animal that has a shell and lives in water.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

additionalData.altText: An animal with eight arms that lives in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am very big and swim in the ocean. People sometimes ride on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I breathe air through a blowhole.

additionalData.altText: A very big mammal that swims in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with a hard shell and big claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦞 I can pinch with my claws.

additionalData.altText: A hard-shelled sea animal with claws.

ocean.question: I am a very old and wise animal that swims slowly with a shell. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🥚 I lay my eggs on the beach.

additionalData.altText: An old wise slow animal with a shell.

ocean.question: I’m a type of home that many ocean animals live in. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I’m made of many tiny animals.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and love to jump out of the water. I am very smart! What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I like to play with people.

additionalData.altText: An aquatic animal that is very smart.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with many, many sharp teeth. Be careful! What am I?

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine at night! I give the Earth light, what am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I come out when it's dark.
🧀 Sometimes I look like cheese in the sky.

cosmos.question: I'm hot and bright, and I shine in the day! I give the Earth light and warmth, what am I?
I'm a sparkly dot, far, far away. There are lots and lots of me! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball that floats in space. You live on me!
I'm a big, round planet, known for my rings! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 I have many rings made of ice and rock.
🛰️ You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and sometimes called the Red Planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me someday.

cosmos.question: I'm a big, spinning ball of gas. I am the biggest planet! What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I have a Great Red Spot.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us look like animals.
🔭 You can see me at night.

cosmos.question: I'm a huge group of stars, gas and dust, held together by gravity. What am I?
I am a rock that flies through space. Sometimes I burn up when I enter Earth's atmosphere and become a shooting star!

hints.text: ☄️ I can be big or small.
🌠 I make a bright light when I burn up.
